title: HELP! My patcher hasn't worked for the past 2 months
body: For the past two months when ever i open the league patcher it, the "Launch" button is there, but no matter how many times i've clicked on it nothing happens. Even when a new patch rolled out it was still there, i didnt download any files or anything. But no matter how much times i click on it , nothing happens. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling but once the patcher opens it still says "Launch" and clicking on that button doesnt nothing. I can't swap regions or repair the patcher because i can never click on it. I've left my patcher on for over 9 hours and nothing happens. Help please i really want to play in the preseason!

replies.body:
Hey Astin,

Can you try running the lol.launcher.admin.exe file in your League of Legends folder? If that doesn't work, try the same thing except in Compatibility Mode for Windows 7.

Hey

Thanks for the post - hopefully there's an easy fix for you!

Here are a couple of initial suggestions that can help you with common problems:

* I'm not sure what else you might have tried, but he [support page on Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) covers a lot of things you can do to ensure that the launcher works properly.  I'd definitely check it out and try out the suggestions there.
* If you're still having issues, another great place you can get help is by [sending a request to player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new), who can help you one-on-one.

Let me know how you go!
Cheers
Mindstar
